results.title: Azure Bot Framework SDK to Microsoft 365 Agents SDK migration guidance for nodejs
results.description: Azure Bot Framework SDK to Microsoft 365 Agents SDK migration guidance for nodejs This article describes the required changes to migrate from Bot Framework SDK for Node.js. Prerequisites Node.js version 20 or higher Existing Bot Framework SDK project Azure Bot Service resource (remains unchanged during migration) NodeJS SDK Code changes The.

results.title: Build a TypeScript MCP server using Azure Container Apps
results.description: Concepts: Schema-Based Routing: Uses Zod schemas for type-safe request handling Tool Discovery: ListToolsRequestSchema returns static TodoTools array Tool Execution: CallToolRequestSchema finds and executes tools Error Handling: Graceful handling of unknown tools Response Format: MCP-compliant response structure Type Safety: TypeScript types.

descriptions.content: Concepts: Schema-Based Routing: Uses Zod schemas for type-safe request handling Tool Discovery: ListToolsRequestSchema returns static TodoTools array Tool Execution: CallToolRequestSchema finds and executes tools Error Handling: Graceful handling of unknown tools Response Format: MCP-compliant response structure Type Safety: TypeScript types.

results.title: Web app as MCP server in GitHub Copilot Chat agent mode (Node.js) - Azure App Service
results.description: The SDK uses zod for input validation. description in the configuration object and describe() in inputSchema provide human-readable descriptions for tools and input. The URL looks like this in the AZD output: Deploying services (azd deploy) (✓) Done: Deploying service web - Endpoint:  Once azd up finishes, open .vscode/mcp.json. Change the URL.
